channel.title: Nhật Kí Phát Triển Dự Án
channel.description: Recent content on Nhật Kí Phát Triển Dự Án

item.title: Go Pros and Cons
item.description: GO là gì Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software. Pros and Cons of GO Pros of GO Go Is Fast Go is compiled to machine code, it will naturally outperform languages that are interpreted or have virtual runtimes Easy to Learn Go’s syntax is small compared to other languages, and it’s easy to learn Static Typing

item.title: Ruby Pros and Cons
item.description: Ruby là gì A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write. Pros of Ruby Clear syntax Best Industry Standards: MVC, DRY(Don’t repeat yourself), TDD ( Rspec ) The leading framework of ruby is Ruby on Rails(ROR) Speed of Development with big community, dozens of open-source lib calls “gems” As an added bonus, Rails ships with a default ORM system (ActiveRecord) Vibrant RoR Community You can develop MVP very fast on Ruby, it takes less time than on other languages.

item.title: Php Pros and Cons
item.description: PHP là gì - PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development. - Fast, flexible and pragmatic, PHP powers everything from your blog to the most popular websites in the world. Điểm mạnh Dễ học, cú pháp cực kì đơn giản Cộng đồng lớn, nhiều framework lớn : Symfony, Laravel Đặc biệt CMS nổi tiếng hiện nay: wordpress Free, nhiều hosting hỗ trợ Điểm yếu Là ngôn ngữ thông dịch interpreted Sinh ra để làm web Bắt đầu PHP Tutorial : for newbie Wordpress : cms Codeignter : simple mvc php framework Symfony : large and powerful php framework Laravel : hot framework Lumen : build effective REST API

item.title: Nodejs Pros and Cons
item.description: Đầu tiên nodejs là cái quái gì vậy? Bạn nghĩ sao nếu javascript có thể chạy trên máy chủ? Các đặc tính quan trọng của nodejs Một điển hình về mô hình truyền thống Mô hình mà js ở phía server Được sự hậu thuẩn của google Node.js® is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. Trang chủ download nodejs: nodejs.org As an asynchronous event driven JavaScript runtime, Node is designed to build scalable network applications

item.title: Bài 001 : Cài đặt ruby
item.description: Current Ruby stable version https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/ 2.5.1 1.Hướng dẫn cài đặt ruby với rbenv trên ubuntu(16.04) Chi tiết các bước thực hiện Cài đặt các gói ruby dependencies Cài đặt rbenv Cài đặt ruby Kiểm tra version Cài đặt gem bundler để quản lí packages Update sudo apt-get update Cài đặt các gói ruby dependencies sudo apt-get install -y libssl-dev libreadline-dev zlib1g-dev sudo apt-get install -y curl gnupg build-essential Cài đặt rbenv Link tham khảo : https://github.

item.title: Facebook Access Token
item.description: 1.Access Tokens Generating User Access Tokens There are two kinds of user access tokens: Short Term User Token Generation System User Token Generation 1.1. Short Term User Token Generation

item.title: 1st stack: Ruby On Rails
item.description: Tổng quan về 1st stack 1. Backbone : ruby on rails ( ror ) Ruby version : >= 2.5.1 Rails version : >= 5.2.0 2. Relational Databases PostgreSQL MYSQL 3. NoSQL Redis Memcached 4.Caching Caching stragies : https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/caching-strategies Caching with rails : http://guides.rubyonrails.org/caching_with_rails.html 5.Best practice for production https://medium.com/@rdsubhas/ruby-in-production-lessons-learned-36d7ab726d99 6.Ruby released news https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/branches/ https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/releases/ https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/news/ https://github.com/ruby/ruby Bonus php : http://php.net/supported-versions.php

item.title: Example
item.description: Example for hlcode import './App.scss'; import hello from './hello'; hello(); Example for hlcode with collapse Example hightlight text import './App.scss'; import hello from './hello'; hello();

item.title: Hugo Tips
item.description: 1.Commands Command Description hugo server run dev server in local hugo build hugo new page-name.md new page hugo new blog/post-name.md new blog post hugo new note/projectname-day001.md new project note hugo new article/subject-001-installation.md new subject's article 2.Shortcodes 2.1.Hightlight Code Command Description <OPENTAG> <hlcode> <CLOSETAG> </hlcode>
